primary.question: What treatment are you leaning toward?
How ready are you feeling to make a decision?
choices: I am ready to make a decision
I am not ready to make a decision
I don’t know if I’m ready to make a decision

followup.question: What would help you to make a decision? (Check all that apply)
choices: Discussing my options with my loved ones
Discussing my options with my oncologist/surgeon, nurses, or other providers
Hearing more about other women’s decisions
